title_translation.es: Crisis de Gaza: Respuesta Legal Internacional

content_translation.en:
In October 2023, Israel launched a **military incursion** in Gaza that resulted in over 21,500 Palestinian deaths. This campaign has raised **genocide allegations** internationally and sparked **contentious debates** about human rights violations.

South Africa filed a **litigation** at the International **Tribunal of Justice (ICJ)** against Israel for 'genocide charges'. The case claims that Israel **deliberately orchestrated** a **systematic strategy** to destroy the Palestinian population.

Saudi Arabia and other countries have strongly condemned these **atrocities** and called them 'genocide'. However, Israel has **categorically refuted** these allegations, describing their campaign as **legitimate self-defense**.

The UN's top **adjudicative body** has begun **deliberations** on this case, which will establish an important **jurisprudential benchmark** for the international community. This situation has created a profound **humanitarian catastrophe** worldwide and various countries have called for a **diplomatic resolution**.
content_translation.es:
En octubre de 2023, Israel lanz√≥ una **military incursion** en Gaza que result√≥ en m√°s de 21,500 muertes palestinas. Esta campa√±a ha levantado **genocide allegations** internacionalmente y desatado **contentious debates** sobre violaciones de derechos humanos.

Sud√°frica present√≥ un **litigation** en el **Tribunal of Justice (ICJ)** internacional contra Israel por 'cargos de genocidio'. El caso alega que Israel **deliberately orchestrated** una **systematic strategy** para destruir a la poblaci√≥n palestina.

Arabia Saud√≠ y otros pa√≠ses han condenado fuertemente estas **atrocities** y las han llamado 'genocidio'. Sin embargo, Israel ha **categorically refuted** estas alegaciones, describiendo su campa√±a como **legitimate self-defense**.

El principal **adjudicative body** de la ONU ha comenzado **deliberations** sobre este caso, lo que establecer√° un importante **jurisprudential benchmark** para la comunidad internacional. Esta situaci√≥n ha creado una profunda **humanitarian catastrophe** mundial y varios pa√≠ses han pedido una **diplomatic resolution**.
